issue.title: Installer crashes
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

The installer crashes because of SQL errors :  
Column count doesn't match value count at row 1 SQL=INSERT INTO `vyh7j_sdi_sys_productstate` VALUES ('3', '1', 'sent');

This is fixed and commited in the depth.fr/tp/4.0.1 branche

**Fixed versions :** 4.0.1

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Thanks Thomas.
Will be packaged in the next 4.0.1 version
